opml.body: <outline title="The Masha Chronicles" xmlUrl="http://www.podiobooks.com/title/the-masha-chronicles/feed/" type="rss" text="The Masha Chronoicles - A free audiobook by Lisa Beth Kovetz" htmlUrl="http://www.podiobooks.com/title/the-masha-chronicles/" description="A noir page-turner detailing the roller-coaster adventures of Masha, a reluctant young assassin.  When Masha meets American businessman, Charlie Hammerschmidt, she thinks she's found the ticket out of Kiev's underworld.  When Charlie is murdered in her apartment, she discovers the ride is just beginning.The Masha Chronicles is a full cast PodioDrama featuring Margot Avery, Nina Bernstein-Simmons, Brendan Corbalis, John Farrell, Maggie Low, Willard Morgan.  Engineered by Dan Molad."/> <outline title="Outlaws" xmlUrl="http://www.podiobooks.com/title/outlaw-series-one/feed/" type="rss" text="Outlaws - a free audio drama writen & produced by Steve DeWinter" htmlUrl="http://www.podiobooks.com/title/outlaw-series-one/" description="Steve DeWinter's latest thriller brings his own retelling of the ultimate American legend, that of the lone ranger. Recorded with a full cast, musical score and sound effects, this re-imagining of America's favorite hero proves that one man can fight against insurmountable odds to keep the Wild West from falling into the hands of a ruthless tyrant."/>
